title: Sharing Higher Education Information Resources and Technology: Open-Source-Based Educational Development

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in University Administration and Educational Management, Basic Digital Resource Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement for corporate university administrators/leaders in establishing open-source-based information sharing and collaboration systems

learning_goals: Understand the operational principles of open-source educational resources (e.g., Moodle, Sakai) and design implementation strategies
Establish introduction strategies for open-access journals and educational technologies suitable for international collaborative environments
Build a system for developing and managing educational content using open-source tools in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
